name: Godly Ruller
description:
How To Play:

* You can control only angels. 

* Select angels with left mouse button with draggable zone

* Right click on the ground at the place you want your angels to go

*Angels will fight Demons automatically

* If Angel enters and stays in village, in 50 seconds it will be Ascended

* If Demon enters and stays in village, in 50 seconds it will be Possessed

* Ascended villages spawn angels once in a while

* Possessed Villages will spawn Demons once in a while

* If all villages got Ascended, you win

* If all villages got Possessed, you lose
